title: "Update and Push a File to/from GitHub"
format: html
---

### Update and Push a File to GitHub

## 1. Navigate to the local repository
cd /path/to/your/local/repository

## 2. Check the status
git status

## 3. Add the updated file
git add updated_file.txt

# or 

## add all changed files
git add .

## 5. Commit your changes
git commit -m "Update file with latest changes"

## 6. Push to GitHub
git push origin main


### Update Your Local Repository from GitHub
## 1. Navigate to the local repository
cd /path/to/your/local/repository

## 2. Check your current branch
git branch

## 3. Pull the latest changes from GitHub
git pull origin main
